## NFTCollection.balance() method

Get the NFT balance of the connected wallet

**Signature:**

```typescript
balance(nftAddress: string): Promise<number>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter  | Type   | Description |
| ---------- | ------ | ----------- |
| nftAddress | string |             |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;number&gt;

the NFT balance

## Example

```jsx
const balance = await program.balance();
```
